text:
@realDonaldTrump As you hypocritically stand shoulder to shoulder on each #coronavirus press conference.  
Dude, you need power and respect more than anything. Please be a leader...not such an ass. Re-election is your objective, but you are going backwards...with unprecedented speed. Fascinating.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
